Package io.dimeformat

Class Base58

java.lang.Object
io.dimeformat.Base58
public final class Base58 extends Object
Encodes and decodes byte arrays and strings to and from base 58. This is mainly used to encode/decode keys.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    static byte[]
    decode​(String encoded)
    Decodes a base 58 string to a byte array.
    static String
    encode​(byte[] data)
    Encodes a byte array and an optional prefix to base 58.

  • Method Details

    • encode

      public static String encode​(byte[] data)
      Encodes a byte array and an optional prefix to base 58. The prefix will be added to the front of the data array.
      Parameters:
      data - The main byte array to encode.
      Returns:
      Base 58 encoded string

    • decode

      public static byte[] decode​(String encoded)
      Decodes a base 58 string to a byte array.
      Parameters:
      encoded - The base 58 string that should be decoded.
      Returns:
      A decoded byte array.
